ygData.subject: Permafrost
ygData.msgSnippet: Can anyone provide any information concerning this place.  I spent a few hours there last night and had a very very good time.  I am concerned about
ygData.messageBody:
Can anyone provide any information concerning this place. I spent a few
hours there last night and had a very very good time. I am concerned about
pitfalls/traps and things like that. I have explored a good portion of the
upper floor around where the ice goblin is in the block of ice. Beyond
that, I know nothing of it. If you have any information (no spoilers)
concerning the existance of pitfalls/traps and such, please let me know.
Would hate to get a corpse stuck somewhere that I can not get to.

~Daks/Dyvim
